ovdesc.p: This file holds the list of children available for a product. This is a live file. This file gets built after successful publish of a product.

A product can inherit characteristics of the another product by defining the latter as its parent product and the child product can in turn can have its own children. This way a single product can have a family tree of its child products.

desc.p: This field denotes the name of the child product. The product should be cataloged product.
This field denotes the id of the file AA.PRODUCT.CHILDREN. This field represents the parent product of all the child products.
